nodes.text: Star Wars Doodles is a children's activity book that invites readers to use their artistic talents to create their favorite Star Wars scenes. It was written and illustrated by Zack Giallongo and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 31, 2015. Egmont UK Ltd released a UK edition on May 7, 2015.
A condensed 52-page version of the book was also included in the Star Wars Storytime Tin, released on July 20, 2015.

Younglings can draw, color, and create with all their favorite characters from the Star Wars films. From Luke Skywalker to Darth Vader, every page is packed with doodles from a galaxy far, far away. Readers can use their artistic Force to bring these sensational scenes to life!
